pips-solver/src/app/components/ui/.description: The UI component library (Button, Card, Text, etc.) and theme system already exist in the current branch. Button is already imported in Step1GridAlignment.tsx. Components can be imported from '../../components/ui' relative to screens/builder/

pips-solver/src/theme/.description: Complete theme system with colors (surface, accent, semantic, text), spacing (8pt grid), radii, shadows, typography, and animations. Available via import from '../../../theme' from component files.
